title: Alfa Romeo - Wikipedia
snippet: Under the control of the industrial organization Institute per la Ricostruzione Industriale (IRI), Alfa Romeo initially continued making its signature custom luxury vehicles, but following the financial hardship of World War II, shifted to mass-producing small vehicles.

title: History of Alfa Romeo - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1933 ownership of Alfa Romeo passed, through IRI, to the Italian state because of the heavy debt the company had incurred with banks since the previous decade.

title: Who owns alfa romeo? - HotBot
snippet: To save the company, the Italian government, through the state-controlled entity Istituto per la Ricostruzione Industriale (IRI), took over Alfa Romeo in 1933. This period saw Alfa Romeo producing not just automobiles, but also aircraft engines and other industrial products.

title: The History of Alfa Romeo - Jeff D'Ambrosio Alfa Romeo Blog
snippet: The companyâ€™s factories had been heavily damaged, and resources were scarce. However, with the assistance of the Italian government and the support of the Red Cross, Alfa Romeo was able to rebuild and resume production under the ownership of IRI.

title: Alfa Romeo SpA | luxury cars, performance vehicles, Italian design | Britannica Money
snippet: Alfa Romeo SpA, Italian manufacturer ... state holding company, IRI (Istituto per la Ricostruzione Industriale), until 1986, when it was sold to Fiat SpA....
